title: E119 A Shadow Figure Selfie and Inappropriate Dream Journaling
description:
Hey who hasn't conjured black pigs and flying monkeys to torment their neighbors? Join us for one of our favorite live shows from our friendship's hometown, Boston! Em takes on the ghosts of Salem and Christine brings us the wildly irreverent and murderous case of Jane Toppan. Christine also gets to drink from an extra ATWWD themed wine bottle... and that's why we drink!
Please consider supporting the companies that support us!

author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
